unnormalised: Boro, mhunnllear tum investment-ache vixim vichartat, sori? Bharotant khoob zon lok bhitor sortat, khas korun he apps yevnk lagleat dekhun. Hanvem thodde dis adim suru kelem, ani sach sangta, thodem rollercoaster sarkhem asa. Mukhel gozal munnllear tumchem research korunk zai, bhai. Fuddakuch bhitor sorunaka kiteak tumchea ixttan kitem tori “sure-shot” stock-ache vixim sanglam mhunn. Mhaka ugddas asa jea vellar Suzlon '08-ant chalu aslem – tedna ₹ khoob paisse haraule! Atam, hanv chodd korun mutual funds-ak zoddun astam.
normalised: Bore, tum invest korchea vixim vichartat, barem? Bharotant zaitim lok tem kortat, khas korun hi apamni voir sorta astana. Mhaka thodea velanim survat keli, ani sod'dich sangtale, thodi rollercoaster-achi savari asta. Mukhia vostu tumchoi sod lavpak zai, bhai. Tumchea ixttan kasleim तरी "sure-shot" stock vixim sangla mhonun matra udi mar naka. Mhaka याद asa jevhana Suzlon don hazar ani aath mhanat bhari cholta aslo ani mhaka rupiyancho ek vaddo gairavlo! Ata mhaka bhovshav mutual fundank zantuch ravta.

unnormalised: Mutual funds-achi zatkai munnllear, SIP (Systematic Investment Plan) tumcho ekdom ixtt. Thoddem suru kor, zait ₹500 dor mhoineaak, ani dhire dhire vaddoit voch. Market halta, dista? Eka disak tumchem investment 10% voir veitel, dusrea disak 5% sokoil yevtel. Dhastin vikunaka. Tech porim tum paisse harovtat. Lambe kallak vichar kor – kam-it-kam 5 vorsam, chodd korun 10+. Gold dusro option asa. Kaim zon tacher xevnn kortat. Tum digital gold-ui viktem gheunk zata hea disanim ₹50 online dituch.
normalised: Mutual fundanchim ulop kortana, S-I-P (Systematic Investment Plan) tumcho sangati astolo. Dhaktto survat kara, chod korun rupia panchshe prati mhoino, ani dhirem-dhirem vaddo kara. Bazar bhovto bhouta, dekh? Ek dis tumchem invest das takke voir astolem, dusrea disa panch takke khal astolem. Ghabrun vik naka. Thonuch tum paiso gairavta. Lamb velacho vichar kara - kamat-kam panch vorsa, chod korun dha voir. Bhangaram dusrim vikalp astolem. Thode lok techim sopath gheta. Tum digatal bhangaram hedisani rupia panchasani online ghevuk zatat.

unnormalised: Trading ek veglli khell asa. Tem pros-ank, vo kam-it-kam zankodde aplo vell divpak toyar asat tankam. Tumkam charts-ache vixim shikonk zai, technical analysis, derivatives… ti eka nove bhaxe sarki asa. Hanvem tem thoddea vella khatir kelam, options trading-ant thoddo vell hat ghala thoddea paisseam sangata zait ₹2000 poilim zannkai ghetli. Jhett den ghetele, jhett den haraule. Hanvem tharavlem tem mhaka zobna mhunn.
normalised: Trading ekdum अलग ballgame astolem. Tem pro-zankhatir, vo kamat-kam lok jim zaiteim vel divpak तैयार asatat. Tum charts, technical analysis, derivatives vixim shikonk zai… tem ekdum ek नई भास aslhi astolem. Mhaka thoddea velanim kela, rupia don hazar zanchi thodi रकम zavun उदक sodhunk options tradingani kela. Jaldi paiso मेलवलो, antukh जलदी गाठेलो. Maka tें योग्य ना म्हुण ठरयला.

unnormalised: Nimanne, borem investment tem asa je tumkam somzota. Eka vatten vochunaka. Vegle vegllen company-ache vixim vachat, tankam dhando koxem cholta tem somza. Financial news check kor – Economic Times, Business Standard, hem sogllem. Ani ugddas dovorat, investment-ant risk asa. Tumchea kodde harovpak paisse nasonk zatat te bhitor sorunaka. Eka borea niyoma promann suru korat, zait tumchea mhoineaachea income-ache 5% gheun. Shubham bhav, ani khuxeal invest kara!
normalised: Shetim, barem investment tem tum समजू शकतलें. Jhundak udi mar naka. वेगळ्या कंपन्यांचेर वाचन करा, तांचे व्यापार मॉडेल समजा. आर्थिक बातमी पळयात - Economic Times, Business Standard, अणी तें सगळें. अणी लक्षात दवरा, investmentanim risk astolem. Tumi गमावपाक नाशिल्लें paiso घालिनाकात. Barem कायदे म्हळ्यार तुमची प्रतिमासिक आवक पांच takkeani सुरू करा. नशिबाचे भाग्य अस्तु ani सुखी निवेश करा!
